#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long int n,v,s,i,y,p,t,p1;
int main()
{

cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>p>>y;
    y=y-2000;
    for(i=0;i<y;i++)
   {
    p1=p*p;
     p=p1%(1000000007);
   //cout<<p;
   }

    cout<<(p%(1000000007))<<endl;
}

	return 0;
}
